title: AutoJob
description: A career website that streamlines the job search process in Australia. Built with React and Ant Design for the front end, allows users to filter opportunities and subscribe to email alerts.

title: GreenShell
description: A UI design project showcasing a visually appealing interface for an eco-friendly product line. This project focuses on aesthetic and user experience elements, highlighting design principles.

title: DailyNote
description: A full-stack note-taking application that helps users jot down their thoughts and tasks effortlessly. Constructed with Node.js and Express for the backend, utilizing MongoDB for data persistence.
